definition: abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia
variant of 人[ren2]/"person" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 10), occurring in 兒, 兀, 兄 etc
(try to) overcome (hardships etc)/to conquer/to put up with/to endure
Clinton (name)/Bill Clinton (1946-), US Democratic politician, President 1993-2001/Hillary Rodham Clinton (1947-), US Democratic politician
OPEC/Organization of the Petroleum Exporting Countries

sentences.english: From that day on, the Klatooinians were property of the Hutt criminal empire.
sentences.chinese: 從那以後，克拉圖因人便歸屬於赫特人的犯罪帝國。

sentences.english: To simulate the Force, technicians hid devices on "Kenobi's" person.
sentences.chinese: 爲了模擬原力，技術人員在“克諾比”身上藏了儀器。

sentences.english: We had better take less than 65 grammes fat every day.
sentences.chinese: 每天攝入的脂肪量最好不要超過65克。

sentences.english: At Kajaki the Royal Marines are training local army recruits .
sentences.chinese: 英國皇家海軍陸戰隊正在卡加克訓練當地的新兵。

sentences.english: Amazing Grass, Kidz Super Food, Outrageous Chocolate Flavor, 200g.
sentences.chinese: 兒童超級食物補充，無法抗拒的巧克力味，200克。

sentences.english: Today, my 8 year old little sister said "f you" to my mom.
sentences.chinese: 今天，我8歲的妹妹對我媽說法克魷。

sentences.english: Key work in understanding the problems of using animal blood for human transfusions was provided by Ponfick and Landois.
sentences.chinese: 頗費克和蘭德思發現了給人輸注動物血的關鍵問題。

sentences.english: Wal-Mart’s and Costco’s private labels only use cage-free eggs.
sentences.chinese: 沃爾瑪和科斯克的自有品牌都只使用散養雞蛋。

sentences.english: Put sesame paste in a bowl, mix 2tbsp cool boiled water to mix well.
sentences.chinese: 芝麻醬放在碗裏，加涼開水50克調勻。

sentences.english: WISK solution is safe and effective on treatment of radioreaction of skin.
sentences.chinese: 維斯克溶液治療放療性皮膚反應是安全有效的。

sentences.english: For example one of my main stable foods are 500g of minced meat.
sentences.chinese: 例如，我的經常性主食是500克切碎的肉。

sentences.english: We all know that Cesc is already one of the best midfielders in the world.
sentences.chinese: 我們都知道塞斯克已經是這個世界最好的中場之一。

sentences.english: Mr. Burke was able to quiz the recruiters almost exclusively through email.
sentences.chinese: 布爾克可以基本上只通過電子郵件向招聘人員提問。

sentences.english: "Oh you naughty Whisker, " said the old lady.
sentences.chinese: “唔，你這個調皮的威斯克呀，”老夫人說道。

sentences.english: I know that I get around 90g of protein from that.
sentences.chinese: 我知道我會從中得到90克左右的蛋白質。

definition: grain/granule/classifier for small round things (peas, bullets, peanuts, pills, grains etc)
square/frame/rule/(legal) case/style/character/standard/pattern/(grammar) case/(classical) to obstruct/to hinder/(classical) to arrive/to come/(classical) to investigate/to study exhaustively
abbr. for Uighur 維吾爾|维吾尔[Wei2 wu2 er3]/surname Wei
to preserve/to maintain/to hold together/dimension/vitamin (abbr. for 維生素|维生素[wei2 sheng1 su4])
